greetingText: I really love your name, it's as lovely as you! ğŸ’•
wishText: I promise to hold your hand through every high and low, to make you smile on the dullest days, and to love you a little more with every heartbeat. ğŸ’–
textInChatBox: Happy Girlfriend Day to you, my sweetest bug! ğŸ’Œ You make everything brighter!
text2: I was going to just send a text.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if I made you smile!
replayText: Or click to feel the love all over again.
